prompts: The scene is rendered in a highly detailed, polished, and illustrative digital painting style with clean, textured brushwork. generations.name: Glass City
prompts: A wide nighttime view of a futuristic city of glass spires and suspended platforms, glowing teal light reflecting off polished surfaces. Small human figures move beneath floating skybridges while holographic signage illuminates the empty streets. The city appears silent and pristine under a starry sky.
night futuristic cityscape, glowing teal spires, floating skybridges, holographic signage, quiet streets, starry sky,

generations.name: Scavenger Camp
prompts: A small camp of human scavengers on a cliff edge overlooking a valley with distant ruined machines. Patchwork tents and small fires glow warmly in the twilight, while jagged rocks surround the camp.
